        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Sex"</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s2">"female"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"male"</span><span class="p">]))</span> <span class="ow">and</span>        <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="s2">"Age"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">15</span> <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="s2">"Age"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="ow">and</span>         <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="s2">"Age"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">15</span> <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="s2">"Age"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">):</span>
             
            
            <span class="c1">#Needs fixing, a Dr. and Mrs will not be considered as couple</span>
            <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"cp_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cp_id</span>
            <span class="n">cp_id</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>    
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Feature-Engineering">Feature Engineering<a class="anchor" id="sec7"></a><a class="anchor-link" href="#Feature-Engineering">¶</a></h2><p>Digging further to find family information</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [14]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">f_dict</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">zip</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">families</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">families</span><span class="p">))))</span>
<span class="n">g_counter</span>  <span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f_dict</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"family_has_children"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
<span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"family_has_senior"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
<span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"family_role"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"no_role"</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">ln</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">families</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">f_group</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"LastName"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">ln</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">fs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">max</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">),</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"immediate_family"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">max</span><span class="p">())</span>
    <span class="c1">#Kaggle data doesn't contain all passengers, so parch + sibsp is more reliable than last name look up</span>
    <span class="c1">#Although, kaggle data itself contains a few errors.</span>
    <span class="c1">#if a passenger has a family, assign he/she to the family group</span>
    <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"family_size"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">fs</span>
    <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"group_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">f_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">ln</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">n_children</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_seniors</span>  <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">f_member</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">f_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">age</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_member</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age"</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_member</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Title"</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="o"><</span> <span class="n">age</span> <span class="o"><=</span> <span class="mi">15</span> <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Miss"</span> <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Master"</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_member</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_role"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Child"</span>
            <span class="n">n_children</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
            <span class="k">continue</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">age</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">65</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_member</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_role"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Senior"</span>
            <span class="n">n_seniors</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
            <span class="k">continue</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_member</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"cp_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_member</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Sex"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"male"</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_member</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_role"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Father"</span>
            <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_member</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_role"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Mother"</span>
        
            
    <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_has_children"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">n_children</span>
    <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_has_senior"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">n_seniors</span>

    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">fs</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"family"</span>
        <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">f_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"group_size"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">fs</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Next we work on ticket info and cabin info</p>
<p>Try to guess age info based on title, family info, travel company(use average of respective group)
Next we will try to find family or travel group for travelers.</p>
<ol>
<li><p>Search through families: 
 a. if one has a unique last name, label the group_label as lone traveler, with group_size 1 
 b. if one has more than one family, label it  travel_group as the family name, with proper group_size</p>
</li>
<li><p>Search ticket info to find travel groups.
  a. For lone travelers, check if ticket/cabin is unique:</p>
<pre><code> i. if so a real loner
 ii. use fellow traveler's  label if same ticket, or cabin, increase corresponding group size
</code></pre>
<p>b. For families, check if everyone has same/consecutive ticket cabin number.</p>
</li>
<li><p>From these processes, we will generate the following attributes: group_label and group_size</p>
</li>
</ol>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [15]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">tk_lst</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Ticket"</span><span class="p">]))</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">tk</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">tk_lst</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">t_group</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Ticket"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span>  <span class="n">tk</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">t_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"n_ticket_holders"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">n_t</span>  <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">tm</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">t_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">tm</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"real_fare"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">tm</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"Fare"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">n_t</span>
<span class="n">combined</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">process_fare</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">)</span>        

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">pid</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">t_group</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Ticket"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Ticket"</span><span class="p">]]</span>
    
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="s2">"0"</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">continue</span>
    <span class="n">ln</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"LastName"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">at</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">]</span>

    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">ocp_info</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Unknown'</span><span class="p">]:</span><span class="c1">#Has cabin info</span>
        <span class="n">cabin_lst</span> <span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">x</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">ocp_info</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">]]</span>
        <span class="c1">#All the cabins in the ticket</span>
        <span class="n">c_group</span>  <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">traveler</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">cabin</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">cabin_lst</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">traveler</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">ocp_info</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cabin</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cabin</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]))</span>
        <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">c_group</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"n_cabin_mates"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">c_group</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="c1">#passenger with no cabin info are assumed to be alone.</span>
        <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"n_cabin_mates"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
        <span class="n">c_group</span>  <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

    <span class="n">co_travelers</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Index</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">sorted</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span>  <span class="n">c_group</span><span class="p">)))</span>
    <span class="c1">#index of fellow travelers</span>
    <span class="n">dominant_ln</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">co_travelers</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"LastName"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">value_counts</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">dominant_fs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"LastName"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">dominant_ln</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">dominant_fg</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">f_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">dominant_ln</span><span class="p">]]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span>    
    <span class="c1">#Assign group next:     </span>
    
    <span class="c1">#if a lone passenger shares cabin/ticket with a family, assign this passenger to the family</span>
    <span class="k">if</span>  <span class="n">dominant_ln</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="n">ln</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="n">dominant_fs</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">co_travelers</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Index</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">sorted</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">t_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span>  <span class="n">c_group</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dominant_fg</span><span class="p">))))</span>
        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">p</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">co_travelers</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"family"</span>
            <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"group_size"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">co_travelers</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"group_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">f_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">dominant_ln</span><span class="p">]</span>

    <span class="c1">#else if a group of passenger travels together, assign as travel companions      </span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">dominant_fs</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">co_travelers</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span>

        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">p</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">co_travelers</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"acquaintance"</span>
            <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"group_size"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">co_travelers</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"group_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">g_counter</span>       

        <span class="n">g_counter</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"alone"</span>
        <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"group_size"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [16]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Assign age cat for couples, if both NA, assume Middle age</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">couple_id</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cp_id</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">cp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"cp_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">couple_id</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span>
    <span class="n">age_cats</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cp</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="c1"># mark has couple in the family </span>
    <span class="n">tag</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cp</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="s2">"group_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">tag</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_has_couple"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cp</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s2">"cp_id"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="s2">"NA"</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">age_cats</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">continue</span>
    
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">age_cats</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s2">"NA"</span><span class="p">]):</span>
        <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cp</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Middle Age"</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="s2">"NA"</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">age_cats</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">non_NA_cat</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">age_cats</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="nb">set</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s2">"NA"</span><span class="p">]))[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cp</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">non_NA_cat</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>VIPs are passengers of high social status, female VIPs have good survival chance, while male VIP face terrible fate.
For now, VIP are assigned to passegners with sernior titles, or passenger with luxury tickets.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [17]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"isVIP"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">pid</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Fare_cat"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"luxury"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Pclass"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"One"</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Title"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Officer"</span><span class="p">))</span>  <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Title"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Royalty"</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"isVIP"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"cp_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="c1">#"family":</span>
            <span class="n">cp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"cp_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"cp_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="p">]</span>
            <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"isVIP"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Ship crew naturally bare more responsibly in situation like this, and the existance of free tickets provided an easy way to locate them.
I actually looked up some of passengers with free tickets are actually crew members of another ship, but still they volunteered to serve in the chaos.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [18]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"isCrew"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>

<span class="n">staff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"real_fare"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span>
<span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">staff</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"isCrew"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [19]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">pid</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="s2">"NA"</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">continue</span>
        
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"acquaintance"</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">aq_group</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span>
            <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"group_id"</span><span class="p">])</span> 
            <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Age"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)]</span>
        <span class="n">aq_avg_age</span> <span class="o">=</span><span class="n">aq_group</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Age"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">()</span>
        <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">assign_Age_cat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">aq_avg_age</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="s2">"NA"</span><span class="p">:</span>        <span class="k">continue</span>
        
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"family"</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">f_group</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"group_id"</span><span class="p">]]</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_has_couple"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">cp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"cp_id"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_has_couple"</span><span class="p">]]</span>
            <span class="n">couple_age</span> <span class="o">=</span>  <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"Age"</span><span class="p">]</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Parch"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="n">child_age</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">max</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">couple_age</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">min</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">18</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">)</span>
                <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">assign_Age_cat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">child_age</span><span class="p">)</span>                
                <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="s2">"NA"</span><span class="p">:</span>        <span class="k">continue</span>
        <span class="c1">#group has couple, try to assign member as ch,par</span>
    <span class="n">tmp_group</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Pclass"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Pclass"</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">&</span>
        <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Title"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Title"</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">&</span>
        <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Embarked"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Embarked"</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">&</span>
        <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Age"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)]</span>
    <span class="n">avg_age</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">tmp_group</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Age"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">()</span>        
    <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">assign_Age_cat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">avg_age</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"NA"</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">assign_ac_by_title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Title"</span><span class="p">])</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">pid</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [20]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">int_to_eng</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"First"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"Second"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"Third"</span><span class="p">})</span>
<span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Pclass"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Pclass"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">int_to_eng</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Pclass_Sex"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span>  <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Sex"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span>  <span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Pclass"</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="c1">#combined.drop("family_size",axis=1, inplace=True)</span>
<span class="n">combined</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">create_dummies</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">combined</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="s2">"Pclass_Sex"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_role"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="c1">#,"group_type"])  </span>
<span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"combined.csv"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">train</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Survived"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_sur</span>
<span class="n">test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">combined</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>   
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Done Preprocessing!</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>Done Preprocessing!

</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="A-Closer-Look-at-Processed-Data">A Closer Look at Processed Data<a class="anchor" id="sec8"></a><a class="anchor-link" href="#A-Closer-Look-at-Processed-Data">¶</a></h2><p>Now let's take a look at the features we generated.
Some of the features I'm interested:</p>
<ol>
<li>Group size: how will this impact survival rate?</li>
<li>Group type: family, acquiantance or lone traveler</li>
<li>Survival rate for married couple, as well as their group sizes</li>
<li>Survival rate for officer and royalty.</li>
<li>Father/Mother survival rate</li>
</ol>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [21]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">family_in_trian</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="s2">"family"</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">f_gs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">family_in_trian</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pivot_table</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_size"</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Survived'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">f_gs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">kind</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"bar"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">label</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Survival"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Red"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Survival rate VS family size"</span><span class="p">)</span>
 
<span class="n">f_gs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">family_in_trian</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pivot_table</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"immediate_family"</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Survived'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">f_gs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">kind</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"bar"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">label</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Survival"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Red"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Survival rate VS immediate family size"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#Odd group size 1 family, investigate</span>
<span class="c1">#Seems necessary to differentiate small (2-4 members) families to larger ones(5-11)</span>
<span class="c1">#The different fate of famiies, maybe due to how many under age members there are </span>
<span class="c1">#and how many adults are avaliable to look after them. </span>
<span class="n">fp_gs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">family_in_trian</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pivot_table</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Pclass"</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Survived'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">fp_gs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">kind</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"bar"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">label</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Survival"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Red"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">" Family Survival rate in different class"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#Has 0 or more than 3 immediate family is an indicator of vulnerability, while 1-3 immediate family helps with survival </span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[21]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre><matplotlib.axes._subplots.AxesSubplot at 0xf560f70></pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_png output_subarea ">
<img src="data:image/png;base64,
"/>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_png output_subarea ">
<img src="data:image/png;base64,
"/>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_png output_subarea ">
<img src="data:image/png;base64,
"/>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [22]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">acq_in_train</span> <span class="o">=</span>  <span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="s2">"acquaintance"</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">aq_gs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">acq_in_train</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pivot_table</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Pclass"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"group_size"</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Survived'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">aq_gs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">kind</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"bar"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Red"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span>
           <span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Survival rate of acquiantance groups of different sizes in 3 classes"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#acquaintance group have higher survival rate in first class. </span>
<span class="c1">#Mid size groups fare better, but why no group larger than 3 in 3rd class?</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[22]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre><matplotlib.axes._subplots.AxesSubplot at 0xf3db270></pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_png output_subarea ">
<img src="data:image/png;base64,
"/>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>We want to make sure those passengers in a family but have no immediate family (i.e. Parch + SibSp = 0) have different survival rate compare to those travel alone. These following tables show these two group indeed had different fate.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [23]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">f_alone</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"alone"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Sex"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"female"</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">m_alone</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"alone"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Sex"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"male"</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">f_no_imf</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"family"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"immediate_family"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">m_no_imf</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"family"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Sex"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"female"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"immediate_family"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">df1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">crosstab</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f_alone</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Pclass</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">f_alone</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Survived</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">crosstab</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">m_alone</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Pclass</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">m_alone</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Survived</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df3</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">crosstab</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f_no_imf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Pclass</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">f_no_imf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Survived</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df4</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">crosstab</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">m_no_imf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Pclass</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">m_no_imf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Survived</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">style</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_caption</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Female travels alone"</span><span class="p">)</span> 
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df3</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df3</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">style</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_caption</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Female without immediate family"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df3</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">df2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">style</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_caption</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Male travels alone"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df4</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df4</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">style</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_caption</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Male without immediate family"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df4</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_html rendered_html output_subarea ">

<tbody> <tr>
<th class="row_heading level0 row0" id="T_74483ad2_3561_11e8_bf10_605718cd54d2level0_row0">First</th>
<td class="data row0 col0" id="T_74483ad2_3561_11e8_bf10_605718cd54d2row0_col0">1</td>
<td class="data row0 col1" id="T_74483ad2_3561_11e8_bf10_605718cd54d2row0_col1">5</td>

                <span class="p">,</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Male traveler with no immediate family survival count by age"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Above charts showed surival rate for fathers and mothers have significant difference in different classes.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [26]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">officer</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Title"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Officer"</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">royalty</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Title"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Royalty"</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="sd">"""figs, axes = plt.subplots(nrows=2, ncols=2 ,squeeze=True)</span>
<span class="sd">figs.set_figheight(15)</span>
<span class="sd">figs.set_figwidth(15) """</span>
<span class="n">op</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">officer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pivot_table</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Sex"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Survived'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">op</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">kind</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"bar"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Red"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span>
           <span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Survival rate of officers"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">rp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">royalty</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pivot_table</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Sex"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age_cat"</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Survived'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">rp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">kind</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"bar"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Red"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span>
           <span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Survival rate of royalty"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#VIP female officer, royalty has high survival rate</span>
</pre></div>
