<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Feature-Selection-">Feature Selection <a class="anchor" id="sec9"></a><a class="anchor-link" href="#Feature-Selection-">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [27]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#I think we have done enough work for data cleaning, let's start fitting data to model</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.linear_model</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">LogisticRegression</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.neighbors</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">KNeighborsClassifier</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">GridSearchCV</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.cluster</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">KMeans</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.ensemble</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">RandomForestClassifier</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.feature_selection</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">RFECV</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.svm</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">SVC</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.ensemble</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">AdaBoostClassifier</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.ensemble</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">BaggingClassifier</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.ensemble</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingClassifier</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">select_features</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">model</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="c1"># Remove non-numeric columns, columns that have null values</span>
    <span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">select_dtypes</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">number</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dropna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">all_X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s2">"Survived"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Ticket_No"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Fare"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Age"</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">all_y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Survived"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    
    <span class="n">clf</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">eval</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">model</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="c1">#RandomForestClassifier(random_state=1)</span>
    <span class="n">selector</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">RFECV</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">clf</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">cv</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">selector</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">all_X</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">all_y</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">best_columns</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">all_X</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">selector</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">support_</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">model</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">Best Columns </span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="s2">"-"</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">12</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">best_columns</span><span class="p">))</span>
    
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">best_columns</span>

<span class="n">family_in_train</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"family"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">basic_cols</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SibSp'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Parch'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Age_cat_NA'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Age_cat_Infant'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Age_cat_Child'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Age_cat_Young Adult'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Age_cat_Adult'</span><span class="p">,</span>
 <span class="s1">'Age_cat_Middle Age'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Age_cat_Senior'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'isVIP'</span><span class="p">,,</span><span class="s1">'isCrew'</span> <span class="s1">'Pclass_Sex_femaleFirst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Pclass_Sex_femaleSecond'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Pclass_Sex_femaleThird'</span><span class="p">,</span>
 <span class="s1">'Pclass_Sex_maleFirst'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Pclass_Sex_maleSecond'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Pclass_Sex_maleThird'</span> <span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">family_cols</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"family_has_children"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_has_couple"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_has_senior"</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s2">"family_role"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"SibSp"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Parch"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"OtherName"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"NickName"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"cp_id"</span><span class="p">,</span>
              <span class="s2">"family_role_Father"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_role_Mother"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_role_Senior"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family_role_Child"</span><span class="p">,</span>
               <span class="s2">"family_role_no_role"</span>
              <span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">group_cols</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"group_size"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"group_id"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"n_cabin_mates"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"n_ticket_holders"</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">acq_in_train</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span>  <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"acquaintance"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">acq_in_train</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">acq_in_train</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">family_cols</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> 

<span class="n">alone_in_train</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span>  <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"alone"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">alone_in_train</span> <span class="o">=</span>  <span class="n">alone_in_train</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">family_cols</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">group_cols</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>



<span class="n">LR_cols</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">select_features</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">family_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"LogisticRegression()"</span><span class="p">),</span>
           <span class="n">select_features</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">acq_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"LogisticRegression()"</span><span class="p">),</span>
           <span class="n">select_features</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">alone_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"LogisticRegression()"</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">KNN_result</span> <span class="o">=</span>  <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">family_cols</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">group_cols</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">basic_cols</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">group_cols</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">basic_cols</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">basic_cols</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">SVC_result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">family_cols</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">group_cols</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">basic_cols</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">group_cols</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">basic_cols</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">basic_cols</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">RF_cols</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">select_features</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">family_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"RandomForestClassifier(random_state=1)"</span><span class="p">),</span>
           <span class="n">select_features</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">acq_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"RandomForestClassifier(random_state=1)"</span><span class="p">),</span>
           <span class="n">select_features</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">alone_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"RandomForestClassifier(random_state=1)"</span><span class="p">)]</span>

<span class="n">Adaboost_cols</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">select_features</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">family_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"AdaBoostClassifier(random_state=1)"</span><span class="p">),</span>
                 <span class="n">select_features</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">acq_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"AdaBoostClassifier(random_state=1)"</span><span class="p">),</span>
                 <span class="n">select_features</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">alone_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"AdaBoostClassifier(random_state=1)"</span><span class="p">)]</span>

<span class="n">GBT_cols</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">select_features</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">family_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"GradientBoostingClassifier(random_state=1)"</span><span class="p">),</span>
            <span class="n">select_features</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">acq_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"GradientBoostingClassifier(random_state=1)"</span><span class="p">),</span>
            <span class="n">select_features</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">alone_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"GradientBoostingClassifier(random_state=1)"</span><span class="p">)]</span>


<span class="n">Bagging_result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">family_cols</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">group_cols</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">basic_cols</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">group_cols</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">basic_cols</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">basic_cols</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Tuning-Hyper-parameters">Tuning Hyper-parameters<a class="anchor" id="sec10"></a><a class="anchor-link" href="#Tuning-Hyper-parameters">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">train_by_type</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">family_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">acq_in_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alone_in_train</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">select_model</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">features</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">model_number</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">models_CV</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="p">{</span>
            <span class="s2">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">"LogisticRegression"</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s2">"estimator"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">LogisticRegression</span><span class="p">(),</span>
            <span class="s2">"hyperparameters"</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="p">{</span>
                    <span class="s2">"solver"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"newton-cg"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"lbfgs"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"liblinear"</span><span class="p">]</span>
                <span class="p">}</span>
        <span class="p">},</span>
        <span class="p">{</span>
            <span class="s2">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">"KNeighborsClassifier"</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s2">"estimator"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">KNeighborsClassifier</span><span class="p">(),</span>
            <span class="s2">"hyperparameters"</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="p">{</span>
                    <span class="s2">"n_neighbors"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">),</span>
                    <span class="s2">"weights"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"distance"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"uniform"</span><span class="p">],</span>
                    <span class="s2">"algorithm"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"ball_tree"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"kd_tree"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"brute"</span><span class="p">],</span>
                    <span class="s2">"p"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>
                <span class="p">}</span>
        <span class="p">},</span>
        <span class="p">{</span>
         <span class="s2">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"SVC"</span><span class="p">,</span>
         <span class="s2">"estimator"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">SVC</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">),</span>
         <span class="s2">"hyperparameters"</span><span class="p">:</span>  
            <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="s2">"C"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">),</span>
                <span class="s2">"gamma"</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="c1"># [0.001, 0.01, 0.1, 1],</span>
            <span class="p">}</span>
            
        <span class="p">},</span>   
        <span class="p">{</span>
            <span class="s2">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">"RandomForestClassifier"</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s2">"estimator"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">RandomForestClassifier</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">),</span>
            <span class="s2">"hyperparameters"</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="p">{</span>
                    <span class="s2">"n_estimators"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">9</span><span class="p">],</span>
                    <span class="s2">"criterion"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"entropy"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"gini"</span><span class="p">],</span>
                    <span class="s2">"max_depth"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">],</span>
                    <span class="s2">"max_features"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"log2"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"sqrt"</span><span class="p">],</span>
                    <span class="s2">"min_samples_leaf"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">],</span>
                    <span class="s2">"min_samples_split"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">]</span>

                <span class="p">}</span>
        <span class="p">},</span>    
        <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="s2">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"AdaBoost"</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s2">"estimator"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">AdaBoostClassifier</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s2">"hyperparameters"</span><span class="p">:</span>  
            <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="s2">"n_estimators"</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="mi">50</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">],</span>
                <span class="s2">"learning_rate"</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="mf">0.4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.7</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
                <span class="c1">#[b/100 for b in range(10,101,10)]                </span>
            <span class="p">}</span>
            
        <span class="p">},</span>    
        <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="s2">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"GradienBoostTree"</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s2">"estimator"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingClassifier</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s2">"hyperparameters"</span><span class="p">:</span>  
            <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="s2">"n_estimators"</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="mi">50</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">],</span>
                <span class="s2">"learning_rate"</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="mf">0.4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.7</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span>
                <span class="s1">'max_depth'</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span>
            <span class="p">}</span>
            
        <span class="p">},</span>
        <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="s2">"name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"Bagging"</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s2">"estimator"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">BaggingClassifier</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="s2">"hyperparameters"</span><span class="p">:</span>  
            <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="s2">"max_samples"</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="mf">0.3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.7</span><span class="p">],</span>
                <span class="s2">"max_features"</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="mf">0.2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.8</span><span class="p">]</span>
            <span class="p">}</span>
            
        <span class="p">}</span>
    <span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">models_CV</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">model_number</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">all_X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">features</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">all_y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Survived"</span><span class="p">]</span>

    <span class="c1"># List of dictionaries, each containing a model name,</span>
    <span class="c1"># it's estimator and a dict of hyperparameters</span>
     
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">model</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'name'</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'-'</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">model</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'name'</span><span class="p">]))</span>
    <span class="n">grid</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GridSearchCV</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">model</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"estimator"</span><span class="p">],</span>
                        <span class="n">param_grid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">model</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"hyperparameters"</span><span class="p">],</span>
                        <span class="n">cv</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">grid</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">all_X</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">all_y</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">model</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"best_params"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">grid</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span>
    <span class="n">model</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">grid</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_score_</span>
    <span class="n">model</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">grid</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_estimator_</span>
    
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Best Score: </span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">model</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">]))</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Best Parameters: </span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">model</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"best_params"</span><span class="p">]))</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">model</span>

<span class="n">LR_result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[[],[],</span> <span class="p">[]]</span>
<span class="n">KNN_result</span> <span class="o">=</span>  <span class="p">[[],[],</span> <span class="p">[]]</span>
<span class="n">SVC_result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[[],[],</span> <span class="p">[]]</span>
<span class="n">RF_result</span> <span class="o">=</span>  <span class="p">[[],[],</span> <span class="p">[]]</span><span class="c1">#np.zeros([3,1])</span>
<span class="n">Adaboost_result</span> <span class="o">=</span>  <span class="p">[[],[],</span> <span class="p">[]]</span>
<span class="n">GBT_result</span> <span class="o">=</span>  <span class="p">[[],[],</span> <span class="p">[]]</span>
<span class="n">Bagging_result</span> <span class="o">=</span>  <span class="p">[[],[],</span> <span class="p">[]]</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">group_type</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">):</span>  
    <span class="n">LR_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">select_model</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train_by_type</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">LR_cols</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">KNN_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">select_model</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train_by_type</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">LR_cols</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">SVC_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">select_model</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train_by_type</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">LR_cols</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">RF_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">select_model</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train_by_type</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">RF_cols</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">Adaboost_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">select_model</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train_by_type</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">Adaboost_cols</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">GBT_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">select_model</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train_by_type</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">GBT_cols</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">Bagging_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">select_model</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train_by_type</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">GBT_cols</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">scores</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="s2">"Algorithms"</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="s2">"family"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"acquiantance"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"alone"</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s2">"LR"</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
    <span class="n">LR_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
    <span class="n">LR_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
    <span class="n">LR_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">]</span>
          <span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s2">"KNN"</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="n">KNN_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">KNN_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">KNN_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s2">"SVC"</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="n">SVC_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">SVC_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">SVC_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s2">"RF"</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="n">RF_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span>  
        <span class="n">RF_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">RF_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">]</span> <span class="p">,</span> 
    <span class="s2">"Adaboost"</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="n">Adaboost_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">Adaboost_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">Adaboost_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">],</span> 
    <span class="s2">"GBT"</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="n">GBT_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">GBT_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">GBT_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s2">"Bagging"</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="n">Bagging_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">Bagging_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">],</span>
        <span class="n">Bagging_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_score"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

 
<span class="n">n_algs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">4</span>
<span class="n">score_df</span> <span class="o">=</span><span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">scores</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_index</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Algorithms"</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">score_df</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Best models for passengers with family:</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">score_df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">nlargest</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_algs</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family"</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="s2">"family"</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Best models for passengers with acquiantance:</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">score_df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">nlargest</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_algs</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"acquiantance"</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="s2">"acquiantance"</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Best models for passengers alone:</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">score_df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">nlargest</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_algs</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"alone"</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="s2">"alone"</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fml_algs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">score_df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">nlargest</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_algs</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"family"</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">acq_algs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">score_df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">nlargest</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_algs</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"acquiantance"</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">alo_algs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">score_df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">nlargest</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_algs</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"alone"</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Training-Models">Training Models<a class="anchor" id="sec11"></a><a class="anchor-link" href="#Training-Models">¶</a></h2><p>Cross validated accuracy scores listed in above table:</p>
<p>The final model will use the three best performing algorithms for each group of passengers, and the prediction result will be a veto mechanism, i.e., if any algorithm predicts a passenger to be fatal, he/she will be considered as victim.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">models</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[[</span>
    <span class="n">LR_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
    <span class="n">LR_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
    <span class="n">LR_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">]</span>
          <span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="n">KNN_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">KNN_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">KNN_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="n">SVC_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">SVC_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">SVC_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="n">RF_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span>  
        <span class="n">RF_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">RF_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">]</span> <span class="p">,</span> 
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="n">Adaboost_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">Adaboost_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">Adaboost_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">],</span> 
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="n">GBT_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">GBT_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">GBT_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="n">Bagging_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span> 
        <span class="n">Bagging_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">],</span>
        <span class="n">Bagging_result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"best_model"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">]</span>
 
<span class="n">cols</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
    <span class="n">LR_cols</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">LR_cols</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">LR_cols</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">RF_cols</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">Adaboost_cols</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">GBT_cols</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">GBT_cols</span>
<span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">holdout_ids</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
    <span class="n">test</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"family"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> 
    <span class="n">test</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"acquaintance"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> 
    <span class="n">test</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"alone"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span>
<span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">total_result</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">collections</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">OrderedDict</span> 
<span class="n">model_names</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"LR"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"KNN"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"SVC"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"RF"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Adaboost"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"GBT"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Bagging"</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">model_id</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">models</span><span class="p">)):</span>
    
    <span class="n">model_result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">group_type</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">holdout_ids</span><span class="p">)):</span>      
        <span class="n">group_ids</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">holdout_ids</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">holdout_data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">test</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">group_ids</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cols</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">model_id</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">]]</span>
        <span class="n">predictions</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">models</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">model_id</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">group_type</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">holdout_data</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">group_result</span> <span class="o">=</span><span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">({</span> <span class="s2">"PassengerId"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">group_ids</span><span class="p">,</span>
                        <span class="n">model_names</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">model_id</span><span class="p">]:</span> <span class="n">predictions</span><span class="p">})</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_index</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"PassengerId"</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="c1">#</span>
        <span class="n">model_result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">model_result</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">group_result</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="c1">#print(model_result)</span>
    <span class="c1">#model_result = pd.DataFrame(OrderedDict(sorted(model_result.items())))</span>
    <span class="n">total_result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">concat</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">total_result</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">model_result</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_index</span><span class="p">()],</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">join_axes</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">model_result</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">total_result</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">describe</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">### total_result["Survived"] = 0</span>
<span class="n">family_in_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">test</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"family"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="c1">#pd.Index(list(test[test["group_type"] == "family"].index ))</span>
<span class="n">acq_in_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">test</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"acquaintance"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span>
<span class="n">alone_in_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">test</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"group_type"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"alone"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="sd">"""</span>
<span class="sd">#total_result.loc[family_in_test, "Survived"]  =  total_result.loc[family_in_test,  "RF"] </span>
<span class="sd">#+ total_result.loc[family_in_test,"GBT"] + total_result.loc[family_in_test]</span>
<span class="sd">total_result.loc[family_in_test, "Survived"]= (total_result.loc[family_in_test,  ["RF","GBT","Bagging","Adaboost"]].sum(axis=1) == 3).astype(int)</span>
<span class="sd">total_result.loc[acq_in_test, "Survived"] = (total_result.loc[acq_in_test,  ["LR","Bagging","GBT"]].sum(axis=1) == 3).astype(int)</span>
<span class="sd">total_result.loc[alone_in_test, "Survived"] = (total_result.loc[alone_in_test,  ["KNN","GBT","RF"]].sum(axis=1) == 3).astype(int)</span>
<span class="sd">"""</span>
<span class="n">total_result</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">family_in_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"Survived"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_result</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">family_in_test</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="n">fml_algs</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="n">n_algs</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">total_result</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">acq_in_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"Survived"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_result</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">acq_in_test</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="n">acq_algs</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>  <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="n">n_algs</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">total_result</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">alone_in_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"Survived"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_result</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">alone_in_test</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">alo_algs</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="n">n_algs</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Making-Predications-and-Submission">Making Predications and Submission<a class="anchor" id="sec12"></a><a class="anchor-link" href="#Making-Predications-and-Submission">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">submission</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">total_result</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_index</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">submission</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">submission</span><span class="p">[[</span><span class="s2">"PassengerId"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">"Survived"</span><span class="p">]]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">submission</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Kaggle_final.csv"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
